meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or resembling a sepal.
meanings.sent1: The sepaline petals were delicate and green.
meanings.sent2: The sepaline structures protected the flower bud.
meanings.sent3: The sepaline leaves danced in the breeze like tiny green umbrellas.
meanings.sent4: Her dress flowed around her like a sepaline curtain.
meanings.sent5: The sepaline texture felt smooth and cool to the touch.

meanings.definition: Covered with or consisting of sepals.
meanings.sent1: The sepaline stem held the flower upright.
meanings.sent2: The sepaline base of the plant provided support.
meanings.sent3: The sepaline surface of the fruit looked like a protective armor.
meanings.sent4: The sepaline layer shielded the delicate petals within.
meanings.sent5: The sepaline covering added a unique texture to the plant.
